name: Cyrille de Gunzburg
profile: "Founded in 1987. After over 10 years of advising French and international institutions and art collectors, Cyrille de Gunzburg draws on his knowledge and experience to deal in the major movements of Modern Art. We deal in works on canvas and paper and sculptures between 1870 and 1970, as well as works by some contemporary artists whom we have followed closely for a long time. In our private and comfortable space, we also show particular artists and movements that we believe in and in whom we have acquired particular expertise, such as Jean Degottex, Giorgia Fiorio and the abstract artists of the 1950s. In addition, we offer a full range of art advisory services to both buyers and sellers : Advice on starting and curating a collection Informed advice about the art market Restoration, conservation and framing Insurance, packing and shipping Importing and exporting works of art We work with a range of internationally reputed firms in order to ensure that these issues are handled as seamlessly as possible. To learn more about the artists that we deal with, please go to the Expertise page of our website." The gallery is only open by appointment
